# Icon

<template>
    <div>
        <AtIcon v-bind="icon"/>
    </div>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                icon: {
                    icon: "c-icon-star",
                    tag: "div"
                }
            }
        },
    }
</script>
name
type
parameters
description
default
icon String, Boolean Class of the icon to display undefined
tag String Specifies a tag for the element span
